html:
2.14.20  6:21 pm   can you describe the ideal mattress?

     no, but i know that weightlessness would be a good start. there would have to be several more improvements after that, but i don't know what they are, due to lack of experience in weightlessness

2.14.20  6:11 pm   do people get the messages you write into your songs

     yes

2.14.20  6:11 pm   In the video "might quit" you had this sort of drum solo, how did you make the drums appear when the stick hit and disappear when the stick went away?

     probably something like this

2.14.20  5:58 pm   how would you summarize your aesthetic

     exactly the way i am doing it

2.14.20  5:49 pm   Why do some people not understand basic things?

     maybe they prefer more complicated things

2.14.20  5:35 pm   Have you figured things out yet?

     some of them, but then what happens is more things get added and also the existing things change too

2.14.20  5:23 pm   Have you ever wondered about wonders that wonder upon their own wonders that end up wondering about wonders on their own? Do you ever happen to wonder about that, Bill?

     no

2.14.20  5:14 pm   Weirdest instrument you've played

     some type of internal electronic feedback in a large analog mixing board

2.14.20  5:13 pm   who invented sound 

     you must have done it

2.14.20  4:13 pm   what have you been up to?

     flipping out

2.14.20  3:55 pm   should pizza be made from marshmallows

     they should be made using marshmallows as tools, not ingredients

2.14.20  3:55 pm   What if someone liked the Giants instead of the Dodgers

     they are in for a surprise, when all the players switch teams

2.14.20  3:04 pm   How do you pronounce the planet 'Uranus'

     oh man, you're fucked

2.14.20  2:22 pm   where does the railroad go?

     to a series of towns and cities, and then eventually to the train's secret lair

2.14.20  1:57 pm   how many pancakes is too many pancakes 

     how high is the ceiling

2.14.20  1:43 pm   what happens when i drop my croissant

     it begins tumbling toward the earth

2.14.20  12:50 pm   What was on your last dream?

     i was at burger king and the manager was trying to explain to me why i am not allowed to order 1 burger anymore (only 2), and then he said ok let's start over, what's your name: bill, jake, or bob

2.14.20  12:27 pm   why do i exist?

      that's gonna give you quite a bit of street cred

2.14.20  12:07 pm   What's your opinion on the color green?

     it simultaneously represents sickness and health

2.14.20  11:44 am   what do you do when people approach you with opportunities?

     1. try to understand the opportunity, and 2. try to understand why it is also an opportunity for them, which will help to further understand the nature of the opportunity

2.14.20  10:37 am   You famously do all of your recording/production yourself. Would you ever collaborate? 

     yes

2.14.20  10:19 am   how many days are in three weeks and a half

     24 and a half

2.14.20  10:11 am   how do i paint?

     first step is to locate the paint, and the canvas. you are going to ultimately have to put these 2 things at the exact same location

2.14.20  10:11 am   Got any tips to quickly dehumidify an ocean?

     armageddon

2.14.20  9:47 am   What is your favorite meme

     rust, oxidation in general

2.14.20  9:28 am   Is floor clean and shiny?

     it's actually dirty and shiny. which is a surprising combination, i am surprised by it myself

2.14.20  9:23 am   when arranging and recording instrumentation and stuff i often run into the problem of running through one option for a very long time trying to see if i like it or if it will work, only to at the end have spent maybe 2 hours on it and decide that i would rather not use that idea at all. something tells me that if i listened to my instincts early on about the idea i would know to dodge out and save myself the time and energy. despite that seeming like it should be intuitive this happens quite often. do you or have you experienced anything like this

     yes

     and do you have tips for getting out of that space as effectively as possible?

     first, i would recommend you write quicker. that won't help for getting out of this situation, but it may help you not get into it. once you are in this situation, there is not much i can really recommend, although i guess the best thing you could do is probably look back to what your first idea was and religiously stick to that. because in this scenario, generally your trust/confidence levels will continue to go down, the longer you hang around. so the first idea is the one that is least likely to have been plagued with this problem. knowing that, sticking with that might be your best option

2.14.20  9:15 am   hey bill, I took your advice and I made a song under 3 minutes and was okay with it. it feels a lot better to finish a project without worrying about its length. my question is have you ever felt that a song is too long/short?

     yes

2.14.20  9:02 am   Do you edit in 3D animation,

     yes, i could imagine some editing would need to take place

      hm actually. Are you learning 3D animation

     yes

2.14.20  8:00 am   what are you learning to do right now?

     set and adjust multiple colors extremely quickly

2.14.20  7:38 am   how does the word bologna make you feel

     that depends if it's written or spoken

2.14.20  7:08 am   What's your opinion on time?

     time is what allows my opinion to change

2.14.20  7:01 am   what should i do if my brother inserted staples in a toy?

     there's only 2 ways to go from here. take them out, or put more in

2.14.20  6:26 am   thoughts on it all

     there's too much, and yet still not enough

2.14.20  5:30 am   Why does NASA keep telling us that an asteroid is about to hit and could kill us.

I swear, they've said that like a bunch of time.

They're very click baity.

And even if an asteroid was about to hit us, why do they have to spoil the surprise?

     it seems like you have already figured this out fully

2.14.20  5:08 am   the hekk are you doing

     flipping out

2.14.20  4:58 am   how does one stop only dreaming about the thing and actually also do the thing?

     it seems like there is another important question here, which is: do you know how to do the thing

2.14.20  4:22 am   what's your favorite scam?

     just being extremely honest

2.14.20  3:51 am   whats your favorite minute of the year?

     feb 14, 3:51 am

2.14.20  3:44 am   What are you thoughts on fanfiction?

     prefer fic fantion

2.14.20  2:40 am   what do i do

     you could re-invent the pork chop. it's damn near time that thing got a re-invent

2.14.20  2:17 am   how to find/aquire an animate object? the inanimate ones are no good at all, i've found

     take a look in the mirror

2.14.20  1:50 am   what is your favorite geometric theorem

     never judge a shape by its size

2.14.20  1:27 am   Are you doing 3d animation in the newest project/video?

     that seems likely

2.14.20  1:14 am   How much knowledge do you have

     i know about 10 things

2.14.20  12:44 am   Would you do a live show where you just stand in front of a projector screen of your own face while your music is played from enormous speakers outside the concert hall?

     absolutely not

2.14.20  12:36 am   How to know if the problem is with me or the people around me?

     if the same exact problem keeps occuring with a wide array of different people, then it might be you

2.14.20  12:31 am   Hi, do you have a Voice in your head? Like, the internal monologue,or reading things inside your head?

     sure. for the past several years i've also made it a habit to actually speak it out loud, on recording

     Ive know some People dont have one so...

2.14.20  12:31 am   i want to improve my singing voice. I have a really good handle on hearing/thinking pitch, but getting it to come out right is not smooth. Especially when singing words, something weird happens in my throat and it comes out shaky and unconfident. I found your vocal exercise from this page which I've found useful for intonation, do you have other singing tips for improving support / tone?

     for your situation, i recommend: improvising the lyrics

2.14.20  12:26 am   Why are you so awesome and unique?

     due to the extreme levels of normalcy i have cultivated
